messages.title: An Important Message From Theresa May to You
messages.content: Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is vital. With your help, together we can make it work.

messages.title: THE RISK IS JUST TOO BIG TO TAKE.
messages.content: HIGHER DEBT, HIGHER TAXES, ECONOMIC CHAOS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take back control of our borders, our laws and our money. Sign new trade deals around the world. Ensure a smooth and orderly exit that works for the UK.

Only with a good deal from Brexit can we keep our growing economy and all the public services we rely on: well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting the Brexit deal right is vital for the future of the United Kingdom.
issues.economy: Growing economy with well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, and a strong NHS
issues.health: A strong economy paying for a strong NHS

leaflet.personalStatement: Getting Brexit right matters because it will decide whether or not our children have a safe, secure and prosperous future.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet is a part of the 2017 UK General Election campaign materials.
